title: Beautifully updated East Germantown home near Wister Woods Park
description:
This sleek 3 bed, 2 bath is an East Germantown home! The interior boasts shiny hardwood floors, tall ceilings, and recessed lighting throughout the main level. Make your favorite meals in style, thanks to the stainless steel appliances (dishwasher and built-in microwave included!), along with granite countertops and dark contemporary cabinetry. This home also features in-unit laundry--a great time saver! The patio and backyard offer space for outdoor entertaining, and back in inside, there’s A/C to keep everything cool.
Located just a block from peaceful Wister Woods Park, this home is close to accessible green space, yet still only nine miles from downtown via US-1 and I-76. It’s a 10-minute walk to the Chestnut Hill East Line at the Wister Stop. Town Supermarket is a few blocks away for groceries, plus Weaver’s Way Co-op and more are a short drive away. The East Germantown neighborhood offers a residential feel along with several bars, coffee shops, and parks. In addition to Wister Woods, Wissahickon Valley Park and Awbury Park are nearby too. When you want to plan a night out, you’ll have lots of options! Fiorino, Malelani Cafe, In Riva, Attic Brewing Company, and more are within a quick drive or bike ride.

title: Complimentary Wi-Fi lounge, New fitness center, Beautiful courtyards
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!

title: 3000 SQ FT ENTIRE 3 STORY TWIN : Powelton Villae
description:
Beautiful unique ENTIRE 3 STORY TWIN HOME located in Powelton Village. Historic beautiful original architecture and finishes with an incredible vibe. You don't find properties like this anymore very often. A GEM!  TONS of Street parking available.
This would be a truly great home for a family with children, which the owners would love! Or a couple that works from home with rooms for separate private offices. We are looking for a tenant that is the right fit. If you are interested in playing super loud music or parties...this is not the right spot for you.
Cigarette smoker or have pets, unfortunately also not for you. If you are interested in a quiet building, for a great rental price for the size of this historic building and amazing neighborhood then this could be the right spot for you. The owners have owned the building since the 70s/80s and fond of the arts and care very much about the Powelton Village community.
You will not be renting from a management company or non caring landlords. They care about finding the right fit for a tenant for their unique building.
So please provide a bit about your story. Why are you interested in the house? Tell us a bit about yourself? What do you do with your time? Do you work or go to school? How many people will be occupying the building? The owners would like to limit this property's occupancy ideally to a single family unit or someone who can afford to rent the house as a sole entity. For wear and tear, and avoiding "this roommate can't pay" this month situations. It happens.
The owners would love to provide the opportunity for a home with one of the best Philadelphia public elementary schools, behind Penn Alexander.
The owners do not work with brokers / or pay co op commissions. I am not a listing agent this listing is posted on the behalf of older non technology savvy owners. * Pets considered on a case by case basis! Thank you!

title: $1950 2 bed 1 bath, Quiet Area, free access way
description:
Two-bedroom, one bath bi-level apartment with hardwood floors located on the 2nd and 3rd floors of in a duplex.
You access the apartment by entering from the street, entering the foyer and walking up one flight of stairs. At the top of the steps is the living room, to the left is the private deck where you can enjoy some outdoor space! To the right is the updated kitchen. The kitchen is open to the dining room, great open floor plan concept.
Go upstairs to find a hallway linen closet at the top of the steps and a skylight for great natural light. Two large bedrooms (king size beds can fit in both rooms) and great closet space. Between the bedrooms there is a hallway bathroom with shower/tub combo and stacked washer/dryer.

title: SPACIOUS 4 Bedroom 1.5 Bath Home
description: This very spacious home is on a quiet Overbrook block and has so much to offer! The abundance of square footage creates a perfect living space for a big family or for roommates - there's not just a front staircase but there is also a rear staircase accessible from the kitchen that leads up to the bedrooms on the 2nd floor. More about that in a second. In this large straight-through style home, there's much sunlight that comes through the enclosed porch, then enter the living room through a French-style door. Living room has ample space and a coat closet. Past the living room is a dining room, then the kitchen. Kitchen is roomy enough to eat in. Back door off the kitchen goes out to the REAR DECK! This deck is great for bbq'ing, reading in peace, catching a breeze, or hanging out. Now head up that rear staircase off the kitchen to find the 4 bedrooms spaced out along the very long hallway. There is also a spacious hall closet located right outside of the large and airy bathroom. The bathroom has 2 storage/linen closets, a full tub with shower and a brand new skylight. The basement has tons of storage space, a half bathroom (toilet and sink) as well as a washer and dryer for laundry. Although this home has a garage, it is not included in the rental. Public transportation options are plentiful. The 46 bus stop at the corner, the G bus is just 1 block up and the 10 trolley is very close by as well. Center City is within a 20 minute ride by car or by public transit. Area schools such as St. Joe's University, Drexel U., and Univ. of Penn are very close in proximity to this home. PLEASE TEXT the number listed here if interested.

description: Here's something special - a charming Fishtown house with gorgeous oak floors, full of details, on a great block, ready to move in and make your happy home for a reasonable price. 1ST FLOOR: Enter into open living and dining area with built-in bookcases, lots of historic woodwork, room divider and beautiful stairs with landing. Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Roof Deck, Gym
description:
The studio apartment home at 306 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home has wood floors. This home on the 3rd floor features large windows that face north and have a city view. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 2, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, and Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, or Alchemy. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab a selection of scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday form 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!
